fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Send a machine to shock someone at night, attacking them and healing them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The machine you send takes your place, so your visit is astral.
- However, the machine you send triggers responses as if it was a player. For example, if it visits a veteran, it will be shot.
- You are told what happens to the machine at night. (ie: if it's attacked by the player it visited)
